post.title: We need more faculties - welcome, Doctor KuLov
post.body:
Here is one of our first beloved faculties, Doctor KuLov.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1N2HG4b92SCyyraBkyAC2rBJ1SMZysv2Z5/

and DoctorZ, welcome:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/18on2beXadyCe5GvAYq6sVXD9ejwRLXShd/

Please, everyone, if you are interested in some sort of teaching, join us.

Fields open - 

- math 
- physics
- biology 
- computer science and engineering
- AI
- gaming
- media applications
- architecture
- business and startups
- English

post.title: gaming on zero
post.body:
That would be great if any one of those popular open source games be brought into zero, even tetris or packman, as a fun start.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/13kxqBmFDq13rYFWu6dt7VkDSUUdVqPNLg

post.title: open source chat incorporations
post.body:
a few open source chat applications and their possible incorporations into the zero platform - 

- let's chat
- mattermost
- rocket.chat

post.title: who is mit onzero?
post.body: a mit grad, appreciates zero sincerely, and hopes to develop some wonderful zeros and ones...

post.title: Sponsored research - zeronet for China
post.body:
Themes in this research - 

- Potential of zeronet in and for China
- legal challenges
- best strategy for zeronet in China
- proposed length of study: 1 month
- proposed budget: 500 namecoins

post.title: Sponsored research: zeronet - the launch of web3.0
post.body:
Themes in this study - 

- zeronet: towards the foundation of web 3.0
- urgent issues in zeronet
- much needed second tier applications of zeronet
- proposed length of study: 1 month
- proposed budget: 500 namecoins

post.title: Sponsored study and research
post.body:
We propose, accept, and conduct sponsored research onZero. We are interested in all areas of technologies and humanities. We regularly partner and cooperate with many entities throughout the world for better understanding and advancement technologies and their use towards building a better world. 

If you are interested in sponsor any research, please send zeromail to - 

Dr Mit
mit@zeroid.bit

post.title: Pursue big ideas
post.body: let's try to live twice and pursue great ideas.

post.title: Welcome, the unofficial MIT onZero
post.body:
We do all but not limited following - 

- technology review
- zeronet and related p2p development
- businesses that leverage most upon technologies
- pursue big ideas, unofficially

post.body: Your zeronet blog has been successfully created!
